thread.title: SNP to Sponsor Transformation World: ERP M&A Symposium in Jersey City, NJ on November 12, 2015
thread.title_full: SNP to Sponsor Transformation World: ERP M&A Symposium in Jersey City, NJ on November 12, 2015

author: Roger Elwell
title: SNP to Sponsor Transformation World: ERP M&A Symposium in Jersey City, NJ on November 12, 2015
text:
SNP is pleased to announce it will sponsor Transformation World: ERP M&A Symposium, an evening event that will offer sage advice to attendees on topics specific to transforming SAP, Oracle and other ERP landscapes in the age of high volume M&A transactions. The event will take place at Hyatt Regency Jersey City on the Hudson in Jersey City, NJ on November 12th, 2015 at 6:00 PM. The symposium will present local key stakeholders with an evening’s agenda focused on how companies effectively respond to changes brought upon by M&A in their IT landscapes, build their roadmaps to SAP HANA and other new technologies, and migrate their systems to the cloud. Attendees will have the opportunity to discover leading edge information regarding ERP systems transformation as well as connect with other SAP and Oracle customers to share their experiences.
Speakers from Hewlett-Packard Enterprise, Amazon Web Services, and SNP will offer key insights on the best practices for consolidating, separating, reorganizing, harmonizing, and migrating their ERP systems landscapes in the context of merger and acquisition activity.
“2015 is on track to becoming a banner year for M&A activity, and there’s no slowing down.” says Dr. Steele Arbeeny, President and CEO of SNP. “Companies not only face the continual challenge of keeping up to date with new technologies, but, to compete and grow, IT leaders need to execute complex ERP M&A integrations and divestments efficiently and in aggressive timeframes.”
Highlights of the event include:
Adapt and Thrive During Perpetual Change: How the world’s largest computer and technology company transformed its global enterprise to prosper in a changing business landscape – in record time. The CIO’s playbook: 5 factors for a Successful ERP Data Transformation Migrating ERP to the AWS Cloud in Near-zero-downtime Organizational restructuring: Best practices for aligning ERP and minimizing disruption The Transformation Experts: Panel discussion and Q&A
Transformation World: ERP M&A Symposium will provide important information and networking opportunities for professionals who are evaluating the best alternatives for transforming their SAP ERP landscapes and building their roadmaps for the future.
Register here for this complimentary event.
About SNP
SNP AG increases the speed at which companies implement changes by enabling them to adapt their IT landscapes more quickly and economically to ever-changing market conditions and trends. With its SNP Transformation Backbone® with the SAP Landscape Transformation platform, SNP offers a software solution for automated analysis and standardized implementation of changes in IT systems. The transformation platform is based on the experience of more than 4,000 projects SNP has completed worldwide. The company, founded in 1994, gained this experience with its software-related services for Business Landscape Transformation®. SNP has more than 360 employees in Europe, South Africa and the U.S. SNP AG, headquartered in Heidelberg, is listed in the Prime Standard segment of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange.
For further information, please visit: http://www.snp-ag.com
